roadmap.title: Frontend Developer
roadmap.description: A comprehensive, phased approach to becoming a professional frontend developer

phases.phase_description: Master the fundamental building blocks of web development. This phase covers essential technologies, tools, and workflows that every frontend developer must know.

topics.title: Internet & Web Basics
topics.description: Learn how the internet and web technologies work together.
topics.long_description:
Covers how data flows across the internet.
Explains servers, browsers, DNS, and request lifecycles.
topics.learning_objectives: Understand core internet infrastructure and protocols.
topics.outcomes: Ability to explain how a web request travels from browser to server.

seo.meta_description: Learn how the internet, HTTP, DNS, and browsers work.

topics.title: HTML (Core)
topics.description: Learn semantic and accessible HTML for modern web pages.
topics.long_description:
Focuses on writing meaningful HTML markup.
Covers accessibility and SEO-friendly structure.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build structured and SEO-friendly pages.

seo.meta_description: Master semantic HTML and accessibility basics.

topics.title: CSS (Core)
topics.description: Style layouts and responsive designs using modern CSS.
topics.long_description:
Covers layout systems and responsive techniques.
Introduces modern CSS features and variables.
topics.outcomes: Ability to design layouts using Flexbox and Grid.

seo.meta_description: Learn Flexbox, Grid, and responsive design.

topics.title: JavaScript (Core)
topics.description: Learn core JavaScript for dynamic web applications.
topics.long_description:
Covers language fundamentals and DOM interaction.
Includes async programming and API calls.
topics.learning_objectives: Understand JS fundamentals and browser APIs.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build interactive web experiences.

seo.meta_description: Learn JavaScript fundamentals and async programming.

topics.title: Version Control
topics.description: Track code changes using Git version control.
topics.long_description:
Introduces Git fundamentals.
Covers basic workflows for collaboration.
topics.outcomes: Ability to manage code history and collaborate.

seo.meta_description: Learn Git basics and workflows.

topics.title: VCS Hosting
topics.description: Host and collaborate on repositories using cloud-based version control platforms.
topics.long_description:
Covers cloud platforms for hosting Git repositories.
Focuses on collaboration, issues, pull requests, and automation basics.
topics.learning_objectives: Learn to collaborate and manage repositories in the cloud.
topics.outcomes: Ability to manage repos, issues, and basic CI workflows.

seo.meta_description: Learn GitHub, pull requests, and GitHub Actions basics.

topics.title: Code Editors & Dev Setup
topics.description: Set up a productive development environment for frontend work.
topics.long_description:
Covers editor configuration and essential tools.
Focuses on productivity, formatting, and terminal usage.
topics.learning_objectives: Set up and customize a frontend development environment.
topics.outcomes: Ability to work efficiently using modern editors and terminal.

seo.meta_description: Learn VS Code, extensions, and terminal basics.

topics.title: Package Managers
topics.description: Manage project dependencies using modern JavaScript package managers.
topics.long_description:
Covers tools for installing and managing dependencies.
Focuses on performance and workspace management.
topics.learning_objectives: Understand dependency management in frontend projects.
topics.outcomes: Ability to manage and optimize project dependencies.

seo.meta_description: Learn npm, pnpm, and yarn for dependency management.

phases.phase_description: Level up with modern frameworks, build tools, and professional development practices. This phase transforms you from a beginner to a job-ready frontend developer.

topics.title: Build Tools & Bundlers
topics.description: Bundle and optimize frontend code for production.
topics.long_description:
Covers modern build tools for fast development.
Focuses on bundling, transpiling, and performance.
topics.outcomes: Ability to configure and optimize build systems.

seo.meta_description: Learn Vite, esbuild, and SWC.

topics.title: Writing CSS (Modern)
topics.description: Write scalable and maintainable CSS using modern approaches.
topics.long_description:
Covers utility-first and component-scoped styling.
Focuses on modern CSS-in-JS and modular CSS.
topics.outcomes: Ability to choose and apply modern CSS strategies.

seo.meta_description: Learn Tailwind, CSS Modules, and Styled Components.

topics.title: JavaScript Frameworks
topics.description: Build UI using modern JavaScript frameworks.
topics.long_description:
Covers component-based UI frameworks.
Focuses on React and alternative frameworks.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build scalable UI applications.

seo.meta_description: Learn React, Vue, Svelte, and SolidJS.

topics.title: Meta Frameworks (Production Apps)
topics.description: Build production-grade applications using meta frameworks.
topics.long_description:
Covers fullstack and SSR-capable frameworks.
Focuses on performance and routing.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build scalable production apps.

seo.meta_description: Learn Next.js, Astro, Nuxt, and Remix.

topics.title: State Management
topics.description: Manage application state effectively in frontend apps.
topics.long_description:
Covers local and global state management.
Focuses on modern lightweight state tools.
topics.outcomes: Ability to manage complex UI state.

seo.meta_description: Learn Context API, Zustand, and Redux Toolkit.

topics.title: API & Data Handling
topics.description: Work with APIs and manage remote data in frontend apps.
topics.long_description:
Covers REST and GraphQL data fetching.
Focuses on handling async data and caching.
topics.outcomes: Ability to integrate and manage remote data.

seo.meta_description: Learn REST, Fetch patterns, and GraphQL basics.

topics.title: Forms & Validation
topics.description: Build and validate forms in modern frontend apps.
topics.long_description:
Covers form handling and schema validation.
Focuses on reliable and scalable form logic.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build validated and user-friendly forms.

seo.meta_description: Learn React Hook Form and Zod/Yup.

topics.title: Testing
topics.description: Test frontend applications using modern testing tools.
topics.long_description:
Covers unit, integration, and end-to-end testing.
Focuses on test reliability and coverage.
topics.outcomes: Ability to write and maintain automated tests.

seo.meta_description: Learn Vitest, Jest, Playwright, and Cypress.

topics.title: Linters & Formatters
topics.description: Maintain code quality using linters and formatters.
topics.long_description:
Covers automated code style and linting tools.
Focuses on consistency and error prevention.
topics.outcomes: Ability to enforce consistent coding standards.

seo.meta_description: Learn ESLint, Prettier, and Biome.

topics.title: Performance Optimization
topics.description: Optimize frontend applications for speed and performance.
topics.long_description:
Covers performance measurement and optimization strategies.
Focuses on real-world frontend performance techniques.
topics.learning_objectives: Understand how to measure and improve frontend performance.
topics.outcomes: Ability to optimize load time and runtime performance.

seo.meta_description: Learn Lighthouse, code splitting, and Web Vitals.

topics.title: Web Security
topics.description: Secure frontend applications against common web threats.
topics.long_description:
Covers browser security concepts and web vulnerabilities.
Focuses on frontend-focused security best practices.
topics.learning_objectives: Understand common web security risks and protections.
topics.outcomes: Ability to apply security best practices in frontend apps.

seo.meta_description: Learn HTTPS, CORS, CSP, and OWASP risks.

topics.title: Authentication & Auth Flows
topics.description: Implement authentication and authorization in frontend apps.
topics.long_description:
Covers modern authentication standards and flows.
Includes third-party authentication providers.
topics.learning_objectives: Understand authentication flows and token-based systems.
topics.outcomes: Ability to integrate secure authentication into apps.

seo.meta_description: Learn JWT, OAuth, and auth providers.

topics.title: Deployment & Hosting
topics.description: Deploy and host frontend applications to production.
topics.long_description:
Covers modern frontend deployment platforms.
Focuses on CI/CD and hosting workflows.
topics.outcomes: Ability to deploy and manage production apps.

seo.meta_description: Learn Vercel, Netlify, and Cloudflare Pages.

topics.title: Monitoring & Error Tracking
topics.description: Monitor frontend apps and track runtime errors.
topics.long_description:
Covers error monitoring and session replay tools.
Focuses on improving production stability.
topics.outcomes: Ability to track and debug production issues.

seo.meta_description: Learn Sentry and LogRocket.

topics.title: Design Systems
topics.description: Build and maintain scalable design systems.
topics.long_description:
Covers component libraries and documentation.
Focuses on theming and design consistency.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build and maintain reusable UI systems.

seo.meta_description: Learn component libraries, Storybook, and theming.

topics.title: Engineering Practices
topics.description: Apply professional engineering practices in frontend teams.
topics.long_description:
Covers collaboration and architectural best practices.
Focuses on scalable project organization.
topics.outcomes: Ability to work effectively in team environments.

seo.meta_description: Learn code reviews, architecture, and monorepos.

phases.phase_description: Master advanced topics, specialize in your chosen areas, and prepare for senior-level roles. This phase focuses on advanced web APIs, accessibility, cross-platform development, and professional portfolio building.

topics.title: Web APIs & Advanced Browser APIs
topics.description: Use advanced browser APIs for powerful web features.
topics.long_description:
Covers storage, background processing, and offline support.
Focuses on advanced browser capabilities.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build advanced browser-powered features.

seo.meta_description: Learn Service Workers, Web Workers, and storage APIs.

topics.title: Accessibility (Advanced)
topics.description: Build inclusive and accessible web applications.
topics.long_description:
Covers accessibility standards and advanced techniques.
Focuses on testing and ARIA usage.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build WCAG-compliant applications.

seo.meta_description: Learn WCAG, ARIA, and accessibility testing.

topics.title: Mobile & Desktop (Optional Career Boost)
topics.description: Extend frontend skills to mobile and desktop platforms.
topics.long_description:
Covers cross-platform and desktop app frameworks.
Focuses on optional career expansion paths.
topics.outcomes: Ability to build mobile or desktop apps using web tech.

seo.meta_description: Learn React Native, Flutter, Electron, and Tauri.

topics.title: Portfolio & Career
topics.description: Prepare a strong frontend portfolio and career profile.
topics.long_description:
Covers portfolio building and career preparation.
Focuses on interviews and real-world experience.
topics.learning_objectives: Understand how to position yourself as a frontend professional.
topics.outcomes: Ability to present skills and prepare for interviews.

seo.meta_description: Learn portfolio building and interview prep.
